casebody.data:
Taylor
v.
Lewis 301P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 29, 2016 Michael Anthony Taylor, for Taylor, Michael Anthony. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of December 2016 by Petitioner to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of December 2016."
